original_title: Silent Cry: The Darker Side of Trafficking
overview: This documentary goes where no other film about child sex trafficking has gone before to provide accurate, in-depth, and gut-wrenching information, testimonies, and statistics on the darkest elements of this issue.
tagline: This documentary goes where no other film about child sex trafficking has gone before to provide accurate, in-depth, and gut-wrenching information, testimonies, and statistics on the darkest elements of this issue.
title: Silent Cry: The Darker Side of Trafficking
